login.title: Scale forestation with digital transparency and trust!
login.sub-title: I don’t have a NEAR Account
login.tooltip: Don’t have a NEAR Account? Go ahead and click the button above to get started! All you need to do is select “Create a New Account” from the dropdown menu. A NEAR Account is required in order to access the Open Forest Protocol Dashboard.
acc.title: Setup Your Account
acc.input-terms: By continuing, you agree to OFP Conditions of Use and Privacy Notice.
launch.desc1: The future of forestation starts with the Open Forest Protocol. Launch a project today and track the full lifecycle of your forest within our ecosystem.
launch.title2: Welcome to the Open Forest Protocol!
launch.desc2: It looks like you don’t have any ongoing forest projects. Click the button below to set up your project! (Estimated completion time is about 10 minutes).
wizard.title: Register a New Project
wizard.step1.creator: Add Funder
wizard.step1.input5.label: Funders Information
wizard.step2.prev.title: Let’s set up your forest zone!
wizard.step2.prev.desc: Outline your area with precision, by either drawing it manually on the map or uploading the GEO data file. Make sure to check the location and borders of your zone once it’s outlined on the map. This will help avoid your project overlapping with other projects.
wizard.step3.tooltip.textarea: The more details you provide about your project, the better it is introduced to the community. Include tree species, suppliers, information about yourself and your team, etc.
wizard.step3.tooltip.files: Helpful documents to include can be: Land tenure claims/deeds, forest maps or ground surveys, project goals, or any other information that helps describe your project.
wizard.step4.tooltip1: The cost of minting the NFT, a unique digital item in the blockchain that will represent the plot of land that will be reforested in your project.
wizard.step4.tooltip2: The amount of DAI to be locked o your wallet to start the project, which can later be used to cover the first stage report upload fee.
wizard.step4.tooltip3: Cost for covering the first stage report upload.
wizard.step4.tooltip4: The total amount to cover your fee for report uploads during all stages of your project.
wizard.popup.title: Success!
wizard.popup.desc: A digital footprint of your project has been created and is now on-chain.
existing.title: Existing Projects
existing.filter.name: Name
existing.ipfsError: Some error with IPFS, try later
projectPage.state.tooltip: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
projectPage.description.title: Project Description
